nanocenter-search-placeholder: Main search input placeholder text. Feel free to use {{PLURAL:{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}|page|pages}}.
nanocenter-loggedin: Label for logged in users' user menu (if their username is too long to fit)
nanocenter-anonymous:
Label for anonymous (not logged in) user menu
{{Identical|Anonymous}}
nanocenter-loggedinas:
Note for personal menu for logged in users noting their current username

Parameters:
* $1 - username
nanocenter-notloggedin:
Note for personal menu for anonymous users clarifying that they are not logged in
{{Identical|Not logged in}}
nanocenter-userpage:
User page/profile link label in the personal menu
{{Identical|User page}}
Parameters:
* $1 - username, used for GENDER
nanocenter-talkpage:
Talk page link label in the personal menu.
Parameters:
* $1 - username, used for GENDER
nanocenter-pagelog: Label for Special:Log link for the page. The page is singular.
nanocenter-more:
Label for the more tools dropdown menu in the page actions toolbar
{{Identical|More}}
nanocenter-sitetools: Label for general site tools menu in sidebar
nanocenter-userpagetools: Label for actions associated with a userpage
nanocenter-namespaces:
Label for page namespaces and watch tools
{{Identical|Namespace}}
nanocenter-languages:
Label for the other languages dropdown
{{Identical|Language}}
nanocenter.css:
{{optional}}
CSS applied to users using Timeless skin.
nanocenter.js:
{{optional}}
JS for users using Timeless skin.
